mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO ITAX_AUDITOR_EXCHANGE (DATE_MONTH, CHANGE_TICKET_NO, CHANGE_ISSUE_DATE, NO, ORIGIN_TICKET_NO, CORRESPONDENCE, ORIGIN_ISSUE_DATE, SALES_SOURCE, ORI_SOURCE)
SELECT #{item.dateMonth, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.changeTicketNo, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.changeIssueDate, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.no, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.originTicketNo, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.correspondence, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.originIssueDate, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.salesSource, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.oriSource, jdbcType=VARCHAR} FROM DUAL
